<Heading

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/quotation/1/updateDebtor"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint executes additional logic to create, update and delete default CRM discount lines. If you do
not make use of this functionality, you can also use the default update endpoint.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
